name: Desert Delivery
description:
Submission to June/July Jackpot Jam 2019
Theme: "Heatwave"

A customer ordered a pizza - their location... in the middle of the desert? Avoid cacti and escape from the heatwave by jumping, sliding, and boosting to make the delivery right on time.

Controls:

  • [WASD] or Arrow Keys to Move - [A] to Slow Down, [D] to Speed Up
  • [S] or Arrow Key Down to Slide
  • [SPACE] to Jump
  • [Q] to Boost
  • [ESC] to Pause
  • [ENTER] or [SPACE] to Select

Tips:

  • If in the heatwave, your Energy Bar will be rapidly reduced. If you have no Energy and are caught in the heatwave, you will be exhausted and the level will restart.
  • When your Energy Bar is depleted, you move slightly slower. Keep your energy up!
  • Ice Cubes restore almost 1/2 of your Energy Bar.
  • Boosting doubles your speed for a short duration of time but uses 1/4 of your Energy Bar.
  • Boosting destroys cacti - you can use this to escape prickly situations at the cost of your Energy.
  • Sliding too long slows you down!

Credits:

  • Art - Nhoconic
  • Programming - StealthNinja
  • Level Design - Substitute
  • Tire Squeal sound by Mike Koenig. Retrieved from http://soundbible.com/1178-Tires-Squealing.html
  • Music - "So, let see, what you can" by Alexandr Zhelanov https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov. Retrieved from https://opengameart.org/content/so-let-see-what-you-can
